content: Free Fire celebrates its eighth anniversary with the Infinity and Celebration update: Garena Free Fire is turning eight, and it’s celebrating with a month-long event that is packed with rewards. Running from June 20th to July 13th, the “Infinity and Celebration” anniversary update brings a full slate of fresh content, new gameplay mechanics, exclusive cosmetics, and the series’ first customisable train lobby.The headliner for Free Fire’s eighth anniversary celebration is the Beyond Infinity Male Bundle, a slick, train conductor-inspired outfit that ties directly into the anniversary’s Infinity theme. You’ll need to complete a series of missions to unlock it, but that’s just one of many limited-time rewards. The fan-voted 8th Anniversary Gloo Wall also returns, available through the Gloo Wall Relay mode. ... [MORE]
